name: Verify Account Information Persistence After Update
description:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
  I want to ensure that the My Account page displays correctly and all functionalities work as expected,
  So that I can view and manage my account information accurately.
descriptionHtml:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
I want to ensure that the My Account page displays correctly and all functionalities work as expected,
So that I can view and manage my account information accurately.
statusMessage: expected:<{zip=24703, firstName=Loren, lastName=Nicolas, phone=711-533-5023, address2=No:505, city=Shantaefort, address1=99318 Jule Crest, state=WV, email=chong.nitzsche@gmail.com}> but was:<{zip=07630, firstName=Loren, lastName=Nicolas, address2=No:597, city=Rigobertomouth, phone=775-729-8294, address1=5789 Marie Mount, state=NJ, email=LorenNicolas52@hackett.co}>
statusTrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<{zip=24703, firstName=Loren, lastName=Nicolas, phone=711-533-5023, address2=No:505, city=Shantaefort, address1=99318 Jule Crest, state=WV, email=chong.nitzsche@gmail.com}> but was:<{zip=07630, firstName=Loren, lastName=Nicolas, address2=No:597, city=Rigobertomouth, phone=775-729-8294, address1=5789 Marie Mount, state=NJ, email=LorenNicolas52@hackett.co}>
	at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89)
	at org.junit.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:835)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:120)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:146)
	at com.octoperf.jpetstore6.stepDefs.SD05_MyAccountPage.my_account_information_should_match_my_updated_account_information(SD05_MyAccountPage.java:130)
	at ✽.My account information should match my updated account information(file:///home/runner/work/jpetstore6-webui-cross-browser-and-cross-platform-test-automation/jpetstore6-webui-cross-browser-and-cross-platform-test-automation/src/test/resources/features/us06_MyAccountPageVerification.feature:138)

steps.name: Given I am on the "Welcome" page
Given I click on the "Enter The Store Link"
Given I am on the "Catalog" page
Given I click on the "Sign-In Link"
Given I am on the "SignIn" page
Given I click on the "Register Now Link"
Given I am on the "Registration" page
Given I create a new user account using randomly generated data
Given I am on the "Catalog" page
Given I click on the "Sign-In Link"
Given I am on the "SignIn" page
Given I log in with valid credentials
Given I am on the "Catalog" page
Given I click on the "My Account Link"
Given I am on the "MyAccount" page
When I update my account information
And I click on the "Save Account Information Button"
And I click on the "Sign-Out Link"
Then I am on the "Catalog" page
When I click on the "Sign-In Link"
Then I am on the "SignIn" page
When I log in with valid credentials
And I click on the "My Account Link"
Then My account information should match my updated account information
steps.statusMessage: expected:<{zip=24703, firstName=Loren, lastName=Nicolas, phone=711-533-5023, address2=No:505, city=Shantaefort, address1=99318 Jule Crest, state=WV, email=chong.nitzsche@gmail.com}> but was:<{zip=07630, firstName=Loren, lastName=Nicolas, address2=No:597, city=Rigobertomouth, phone=775-729-8294, address1=5789 Marie Mount, state=NJ, email=LorenNicolas52@hackett.co}>
